department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Threat Mitigation Group at Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) needs a radio frequency real-time pulse spectrum analyzer
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys paosting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by at (2022-12-7) at (2:00pm) EDT. All bids submitted after (2:00pm) EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Threat Mitigation Group at Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) Suffield has a requirement for a radio frequency real-time pulse spectrum analyzer for the measurement of nonrepetitive high-frequency electrical signals over a wide bandwidth.
